fields.name: Which_Sales_Assignments_would_you_like_to_change
fields.fieldText: Which Sales Assignments would you like to change?

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_update_the_Territory_Assignment
fields.fieldText: Would you like to update the Territory Assignment?

fields.name: MessageToUpdateTerritoryAssignment
fields.fieldText: When selecting the checkbox to update the Territory Assignment, we will rerun all of the automation to match these records to the Territory Assignment that they currently match. This means that if they currently match up with the one they are presently associated to, they will remain associate to this Territory Assignment. As well, it is important to note that by doing this, the Owner, AE, SA and ADR assignments will all be updated according to the assignments present on the Territory Assignment record that the given record is matched to.

fields.name: Are_you_sure_you_want_to_update_all_selected_ObjectName
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to update all selected {!objectName}?
